text: Justin Bieber ‘ moves on with mystery blonde ’ ( Picture : Backgrid ) Justin Bieber appears to have moved on from rumours that he has split from Selena Gomez, looking pretty pleased with himself on a night out. Well, that ’ s judging by these pictures of him enjoying the company of a ‘ mystery blonde ’ on 16 March. The 24 - year - old singer and Selena have a pretty on and off relationship over the past years and now Jelena fans are worried that they are over for good as Justin was ‘ caught ’ with the woman and a group of pals. Justin is rumoured to have split from Selena ( Picture : Backgrid ) The pair were seen laughing and smiling in a car after a night out with a group of friends. Now a source close to Selena ’ s family have explained
